extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the GitHub Enterprise Server instance is affected by retrieving the installed version and checking if SAML single sign-on (SSO) authentication is in use.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update GitHub Enterprise Server
extracted_playbook.description: Update the GitHub Enterprise Server to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: GitHub Enterprise Server SAML SSO Vulnerability
